org.enhydra.shark.utilities.ldap

Class ADLDAPClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.enhydra.shark.utilities.ldap.ADLDAPClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LDAPClientInterface

    public class ADLDAPClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements LDAPClientInterface
    LDAP client that can talk with Active Directory server, and does not require any special structure to be defined on the Active Directory; hence the structure type 2.
    Author:
    Veljko Zivkovic, Sasa Bojanic

      • checkPassword

        public boolean checkPassword(java.lang.String username,
                    java.lang.String pwd)
        Connects to the LDAP server specified by LDAPOptions object, and checks given password.
        Specified by:
        checkPassword in interface LDAPClientInterface
        Parameters:
        username - User distinctive name.
        pwd - Password to check for the given user.
        Returns:
        true if password is OK.
